item.title: Marketing indie games with no budget – Notes
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: Emmy Jonhassen, aka IndieGameGirl, gave a talk named Marketing Indie Games on a $0 Budget. It offers a nice introduction to the topic, so I decided to share synthetic notes for it. I also wrote a detailed article on the topic for Game Analytics. There, you’ll learn a lot more about everything I’ve outlined below. Check it out: Marketing Your Indie Game On A Zero-Dollar Budget Emmy outlines 5 key types of contents required to maximize your game’s reach before and after its release.
